description: Customs declaration document analyzer for extracting trade compliance fields with enhanced table extraction

shipper.description: Name and address of the shipper, sender, exporter, or consignor

receiver.description: Name and address of the receiver, consignee, importer, or buyer

goodsDescription.description: Description of all goods, merchandise, or commodities being shipped. Combine multiple items with semicolons.

value.description: Total declared value with currency (e.g., USD 216,000). Look for 'Total Invoice Value', 'Total Value', or 'Amount'.

countryOfOrigin.description: Country where goods were manufactured or originated. If not explicitly stated, derive from exporter country (e.g., USA if exporter is in Austin, TX, USA). Look for 'Country of Origin', 'Origin', 'Made in', 'Manufactured in', or exporter location.

hsCode.description: ALL Harmonized System (HS) codes from the document, separated by semicolons. Extract from table columns labeled 'HS Code', 'Tariff Code', or 'HTS'. These are 6-digit numbers like 854231 or 854239. Combine all codes found.

weight.description: Total gross weight of the shipment with unit (e.g., 112 kg). Look for 'Total Gross Weight' or 'Weight'.
